page.title: 14PLAYING AREA
page.content: We have one play area in Langtree where we have four swings, two seats, one climbing frame, one netball post and two football goals. some nights from about five-thirty about twenty people come up or sometimes only about four people. We play football and other ball games, sometimes we play cricket or rounders. The age range is from about four up to about forty but mostly around ten to fourteen. Sometimes we have fetes up there with stalls, games,food and raffles. We have a lot of fun up there and enjoy meeting our friends.
